text: The prime minister of Dominica is the head of government in the Commonwealth of Dominica. The position was created on November 3, 1978, when Dominica gained independence from the United Kingdom. Roosevelt Skerrit is the incumbent prime minister. He took the oath on 8 August 2004. ==List== Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party Portrait Name Election Took office Political party Left office 1 Frank Baron — 1 January 1956 21 January 1961 DUPP 2 Edward Oliver LeBlanc 1961 1966 21 January 1961 1 March 1967 DLP 3 Edward Oliver LeBlanc 1970 1 March 1967 27 July 1974 DLP 4 Patrick John 1975 28 July 1974 2 November 1978 DLP 4 Patrick John — 3 November 1978 25 June 1979 Dominica Labour Party 5 Oliver Seraphin — 25 June 1979 21 July 1980 Dominica Labour Party 6 Eugenia Charles 1980 1985 1990 21 July 1980 14 June 1995 Dominica Freedom Party 7 Edison James 1995 14 June 1995 3 February 2000 United Workers' Party 8 Rosie Douglas 2000 3 February 2000 1 October 2000 Dominica Labour Party 9 Pierre Charles — 1 October 2000 3 October 2000 Dominica Labour Party 3 October 2000 6 January 2004 10 Osborne Riviere — 6 January 2004 8 August 2004 Dominica Labour Party 11 Roosevelt Skerrit 2005 2009 2014 2019 8 August 2004 Incumbent Dominica Labour Party ==References== *
title: Prime Minister of Dominica
